alert.note: Alert for Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 21 at 1:00AM MDT until March 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Southern Big Horn, Carter, Powder River, and Southern Rosebud. In Wyoming, Sheridan Foothills. * WHEN...Until Noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates will be around an inch per hour around 6 AM MDT, so prepare for periods of heavy snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
